body:
Comment 2: 
exp/html moved from the standard library to the go.net sub-repo
(code.google.com/p/go.net/html) instead.

For the record, the two changes were
https://golang.org/cl/7310063
https://golang.org/cl/7317043

The rationale was discussed at
https://groups.google.com/d/topic/golang-nuts/Qq5hTQyPuLg/discussion
_Status changed to **Fixed**._
